description: Stops a currently running data ingestion job. You can send a StartIngestionJob request again to ingest the rest of your data when you are ready.

parameters.name: dataSourceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the data source for the data ingestion job you want to stop.

parameters.name: ingestionJobId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the data ingestion job you want to stop.

parameters.name: knowledgeBaseId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the knowledge base for the data ingestion job you want to stop.

nested_items.name: ingestionJob
nested_items.description: Contains information about the stopped data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: dataSourceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the data source for the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: failureReasons
nested_items.description: A list of reasons that the data ingestion job failed.

nested_items.name: ingestionJobId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the knowledge for the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The time the data ingestion job started.

nested_items.name: statistics
nested_items.description: Contains statistics about the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: numberOfDocumentsDeleted
nested_items.description: The number of source documents that were deleted.

nested_items.name: numberOfDocumentsFailed
nested_items.description: The number of source documents that failed to be ingested.

nested_items.name: numberOfDocumentsScanned
nested_items.description: The total number of source documents that were scanned. Includes new, updated, and unchanged documents.

nested_items.name: numberOfMetadataDocumentsModified
nested_items.description: The number of metadata files that were updated or deleted.

nested_items.name: numberOfMetadataDocumentsScanned
nested_items.description: The total number of metadata files that were scanned. Includes new, updated, and unchanged files.

nested_items.name: numberOfModifiedDocumentsIndexed
nested_items.description: The number of modified source documents in the data source that were successfully indexed.

nested_items.name: numberOfNewDocumentsIndexed
nested_items.description: The number of new source documents in the data source that were successfully indexed.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time the data ingestion job was last updated.
